recommended_degree: Desain Grafis, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Ilmu Komunikasi, Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Komunikasi Digital dan Media (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
- Create visual assets for social media, promos, and hotel marketing materials (posters, flyers, menus, etc.).
- Assist in photo editing, simple video layout, and maintaining brand consistency.
- Support media visits and content production (BTS, setup, documentation).
- Help prepare design files for printing and coordinate with vendors when needed.
- Organize creative folders and assist the MarComm team with basic administrative tasks.
- Contribute ideas for campaigns and content.
